column1: Local Foods////As I side I got the tomato basil soup
column2: it had some sort of spice kick to it which was not spicy
column4: but just different tasting. Not the sweet type of taste one normally experiences with tomato basil. Needless to say I wasn't feeling this spice
column5: it was just not enjoyable. I had about 5 spoonfuls and gave up on finishing the soup as I just did not care to.
